org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.spark.structure

Class Spark

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.spark.structure.Spark

  • public class Spark
extends Object
    This is a static cache the prevents Spark from garbage collecting unreferenced RDDs.
    Author:
    Marko A. Rodriguez (http://markorodriguez.com)
